page.title: Metal Ceiling Works
page.description: Distributor of waterproofing, concrete repair, gypsum and sealant materials such as Bostik, Knauf, Yoshino, Boral, Fibrin, Gripset, Shinetsu & Star Series

title: Metal Ceiling Works
content: Used to beautify ceiling in outdoor/public areas such as airport lounges, bus and train statiiion and special areas like kitchens and pool decks, alsa available for facades of commercial buildings and bridges etc.
